profile:
MOST TRUSTED PAINTING & DECORATING COMPANY!
 
We are a full service locally owned Painting & Decorating and Restoration Company with a full service Interior Designer. Budget & Save Painters is dedicated to providing exceptional Painting & Decorating Solutions to residential and commercial clients throughout the Metro Vancouver area.
 
Service Areas: all of Metro Vancouver including: Burnaby, Downtown Vancouver, Yaletown, the West End, Coal Harbour, Kitsilano, Dunbar, UBC, Kerrisdale, Shaughnessy, Richmond, Delta, Surrey, the North Shore including, (the British Properties, West Vancouver, and Deep Cove), Coquitlam area, Port Coquitlam, New Westminster, and Langley.
 
We Specialize in Color Consultations, and Interior Designs for Residential & Commercial Projects, Condos, Town-homes, Apartments, Design, Heritage Homes, Small repair jobs, and Maintenance of painting services!
 
Our Customer Service lines are available 24 hours a day - 7 days a week. We always provide references of our many satisfied customers. We use Top Quality Paints, Primers & Stains! Zero VOC Products - Our Business rating with the Better Business Bureau is A+. Look for our continually GREAT PROMOTIONAL DISCOUNTS - CALL FOR A FREE NO OBLIGATION ESTIMATION!
 
Great reliable painters!
Top-Line General Paint, Benjamin Moore Paints, Cloverdale, ICI Paints & Sherwin-Williams. Other Suggested Brands Offered. TOP QUALITY PAINTS, PRIMERS & STAINS. We use the right brands for each project!
Full Interior & Exterior Painting - Commercial projects and Residential projects - Drywall Repairs -Power Washing and Waterproofing. Colour Consultations - GREAT DISCOUNTS OFFERED!
Most brands supplied - Customer brands on request.
Specializing in Condos, Strata's, Multi-residential, Heritage homes, Maintenance, Tenant Improvements, Additions, Renovating, Changes or Moves & Complete Home Projects. SMALL JOBS WELCOME!
 
Our outstanding services have been catering to a number of locations across Metro Vancouver including Whistler, North Shore, Burnaby, Delta, Richmond, the city of Surrey, Langley Coquitlam, Port Coquitlam and many other outline areas. We are experts in providing exceptional customer service in painting & decorating for our residential and commercial clients throughout Metro Vancouver.
 
We are strong believers in safe (ZERO VOC) paint products and practices that save money, and are good for the environment. Budget & Save Painters and Creative Design offers a full range of luxury paint products.
 
We understand that when we are working on your house, you are inviting us into your home. Trust is of the utmost importance to us; we have an impeccable reputation with many local satisfied customers over the years, and being a fully insured company with WCB coverage, so you can feel confident that the construction process will run seamlessly and efficiently. Some have even gone as far as to say that they have enjoyed the process while working with us.
 
We specialize in Color Consulting, Custom Design/Decorating, Full Interior and Exterior Projects, Renovations, Pressure Washing and full Property Maintenance.

profile:
We are passionate about what we do.

That’s the Ocean Drywall & Renovation difference.

For years, we have been researching, working in and perfecting our craft so that we can come to you with the knowledge, expertise and detail-oriented mindset which sets us apart from your average professional drywall company. We knew when we started that we wanted to stand above the rest, to go the extra mile for every client, every day. To do this, we knew we had to be so much more than drywall professionals – we had to be craftsmen, artisans, and a customer-service-driven team bent on solving old problems in new ways, under budget and on time.

In this way, we are able to bring a different kind of drywall service to your door, whether that door is to your home, your business, or your industrial complex. Whether you need a new construction drywall expert or you are looking to do simple renovations, we are the experts who can get you the results you are looking for, and our work is designed to last.

Because our drywall contractors are driven by our customers’ experience with us, we work with you, every step of the way, really getting to know you and your space on a personal level so that we can work to build walls and client relationships that last a lifetime. We pride ourselves on our ability to provide both excellent service and quality work for some of the most competitive prices on the market.

Whether you are looking for a drywall contractor to do drywall repairs, installations or need water damage restoration in your home or business, we are just the team for you. We will provide you with friendly and quality service that you can depend on.

Contact us today to learn more about what we can do for you, and see why Vancouver Island customers love our drywall services. It’s time for you to sit back, relax, and trust the professionals who do every job with precision. Call now!

Over 35 years of experience in Drywall finishing for residential , commercial and renovations . We also offer steel stud framing , tee bar suspended ceilings and painting. All jobs large or small are completed with high end finishing and service . With being member of the Better Business Bureau of BC , we guarantee all our work for our customers. 
 
Call or text us for a free quote today at 6042404003! Feel free to visit our website for more information.
